💰 **[Azure VM Price Checker](https://azurevmpricechecker.streamlit.app)**

A lightning-fast tool for comparing Azure VM prices across regions. Built with Python and Streamlit, this application leverages the Azure Retail Prices API to provide instant price comparisons across all Azure regions.

Features include:

- Quick SKU search with real-time filtering
- Comprehensive price comparison across regions
- Multiple pricing models (Spot, Reserved Instances, Dev/Test)
- Fast, responsive interface with concurrent API calls
- No Azure credentials required

*Tech Stack: Python, Streamlit, Azure Retail Prices API, ThreadPoolExecutor, Pandas*
